ygData.subject: mesmerization
ygData.msgSnippet: This is in reference to the lvl 16 spells mesmerisation, NOT the lvl 4 spell Mezmerize. Does this spell work? I have yet to see a MOB actually freeze when this
ygData.messageBody:
This is in reference to the lvl 16 spells
mesmerisation, NOT the lvl 4 spell Mezmerize.
Does this spell work? I have yet to see a MOB actually
freeze when this is cast, though I get messages saying
that they have done so.
Does anyone have any info on this spell? It would
really help a lot after you hit the Color Shift
button, and all the unattached goblins decide you
might be a concern...
===
------------------------------------------------
Fozzle Brainbender
Minister of the Winds
Spirit of the Moon
Enchanter, Jeweler, Short guy
